siteDescription: Hunt for the rarest Bitcoin transactions. Find transaction IDs starting with 000000... and earn ZELD tokens. 100% decentralized, no premine, no VC.

footer.motto: 100% decentralized. No premine. No VC. Just math.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: This feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!

wallet.description: Secure Bitcoin wallet in your browser. Create, manage, and sign transactions directly from ZeldHash.
wallet.subtitle: Hunt, send and receive Zeld directly from your browser.
wallet.securityNote: AES-256-GCM encryption • BIP32/39/84/86 standards • Stored locally in your browser

explorer.title: ZELD Explorer
explorer.metaDescription: Explore the latest ZeldHash rewards and search for addresses, blocks or transactions.
explorer.searchPlaceholder: Enter an address, a block index or a transaction hash
explorer.searchHelp: Enter a Bitcoin address, block height, or transaction hash.
explorer.searchError: Invalid input. Please enter a valid address, block height, or transaction hash.
explorer.noRewards: No rewards available yet. Check back soon.
explorer.loadError: Unable to load data right now. Please try again in a moment.
explorer.tooManyUtxos: This address has too many UTXOs to display (maximum: 500).
explorer.addressMetaDescription: View ZELD balance and UTXOs for Bitcoin address {address}
explorer.noUtxos: No UTXOs found for this address.
explorer.blockMetaDescription: View ZELD rewards and statistics for Bitcoin block {blockIndex}
explorer.noBlockRewards: No rewards were found in this block.
explorer.transactionMetaDescription: View ZELD balance and reward information for Bitcoin transaction {txid}
explorer.noUtxosInTx: No UTXOs found for this transaction.
explorer.txLoadError: Unable to load transaction data. Please try again.
